review_blob: This beers the best kept secret in PA  it got a better taste then Bud Miller or Coors and costs about 1/2 the price  for a case of bottles with cool little puzzles on the cap similar to Haffenreffer caps Thanks to my friend Walt for turning me onto this liquid gold...good mouthfeel  with a little bitterness and a malty taste that finishes smooth, very easy to drink.
